description: sketch of nude male standing with legs apart and arms stretched out to sides; sketch of limb (leg?) bones at right edge
provenance: The artist; his widow Kathleen, 1946; her granddaughter, Sarah "Sunshine" Schuster, 2001; sold by her through Kiechel Fine Art (Lincoln, NE), to the MIA, 2009
signed: bottom center, in pencil: [Study for \"John Brown\" / John Steuart Curry / 1940]
title: Study for the figure of John Brown in the "Tragic Prelude" mural for the Kansas Statehouse
